June 9, 1975 D Around the Towns Contest
Around the Towns Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
around-the-towns-contest
None
Chard, Winsham, Crewkerne, Stoke Sub Hamdon, and Yeovil Entertainment prize - 1st Yeovil, 2nd Crewkerne, 3rd Stoke sub Hamdon. Deportment - 1st Yeovil, 2nd Crewkerne, 3rd Chard. All bands played in each town and aggregate score announced at evening massed band concert.
May 15, 2013, 8:53 a.m. May 15, 2013, 9 a.m.
1 Glastonbury Brass David Hooper
2 Crewkerne Town Band M. Genge
3 Stoke-sub-Hamdon William Aird
Unknown Result Chard Concert Brass H. W. Govier
